About Assetto Corsa

Assetto Corsa is a sim racing video game developed by Kunos Simulazioni. It is designed with an emphasis on a realistic racing experience.

AC TimeAttack is a companion app that aims to enhance the single player experience for console users. It saves your fastest laptimes for each car and track combination.

Welcome to AC Time Attack!

This app is a conversion of my pCARS for Project Cars app to Assetto Corsa. It displays timing information and stores your fastest laptimes for all car/track combinations in a database.

Instructions

Find out your PS4\'s IP address in the console\'s menu (Settings/Network/View Connection Status/IP address). Enter the IP address in the app\'s settings menu. Enable the WiFi on your device and restart the app by pressing the RESET APP button. Assetto Corsa will automatically communicate with the app once you start driving.

API Limitations

The API developed by Kunos for the consoles is a limited version of the one available for PC and some of its features are missing. For instance, the API does not tell about the layout selected by the user in the game. For instance, the API sees both Barcelona GP and Barcelona Moto as just Barcelona. My workaround this problem is to display a menu with the different layouts for the selected track before starting recording data. A pop up menu will appear after every reset for those tracks with more than one layout.

Database

The database storing the laptimes can be accessed via the Edit Database option in the menu. Individual laptimes can be deleted and the entire database can be backed up as a JSON file with path Downloads/actimeattack/data in your Android device.

Important

Please remember to backup your database before removing/reinstalling AC Time Attack. The database with all its data is part of the app. If you want to reinstall the app or move your laptimes to another device use the backup/restore options in the menu.

Problems running AC Time Attack?

1. Make sure your WiFi is on and connected to the same network as your game console.

2. If you are using an older or slower Android device and you are having problems try changing the UDP rate in the settings menu. This will introduce a slight delay in the communication but might solve your problem.

Reset App button

Assetto Corsa does not inform the app about changes in car/track configuration. The reset app button forces the game to share that information so the app can update itself and record data for the right car/track combo.

The on/off button

This is a toggle button with two states. This button pauses the communication between the game and the app. It is useful for instance when watching replays. Press the button before entering replay to avoid recording corrupted data and press again when resuming driving.
